about.previewSlogan: We help your business achieve new goals
about.previewText: Clients come to us when they have a great idea, but need a team of experts to help them bring it to life
about.leftText: The best talent, no matter where you are
about.rightText: MoraMora company was founded not so long ago. The actual idea came suddenly as one of the respectable wholesale trading companies was looking for a contractor to implement a quite large and ambitious project - to develop their own custom sales managing system from zero level.
